backend/main.mo: An empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping requested changes to affected frontend files and components with high-confidence traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A reference list summarizing major frontend files, their roles, and recent feature‑related updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables for light and dark mode, defining color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the application in TaskerProvider and renders AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout component switching between dashboard, calendar, pomodoro, achievements, and settings sections with applied theme settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Renders mobile and desktop sidebar navigation with icons and a footer showing 'Developed product by Aditya Verma'.
frontend/src/features/achievements/Achie: Displays weekly analytics, charts, and achievement stats with empty‑state handling when no data exists.
frontend/src/features/achievements/compo: Recharts donut chart visualizing completed vs pending tasks using themed color variables.
Recharts bar chart showing daily task completion trends for the current week.
frontend/src/features/calendar/CalendarS: Renders a calendar view for selecting dates and viewing or creating study days with associated tasks.
frontend/src/features/calendar/component: Displays tasks for a selected study day with progress, task list, and controls to add, toggle, or delete tasks.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Represents an individual study day with date, progress, collapsible task list, and task management actions.
Form component for adding a new task to a study day with subject, chapter, type, priority, and optional fields.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Shows an overview of all study days, allows adding days, resetting data, and displays streak info.
frontend/src/features/pomodoro/PomodoroS: Implements a Pomodoro timer with mode switching, duration customization, and task selection integration.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsS: UI for adjusting theme settings including dark mode, accent color, and background images or URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedTaskerSta: Loads, normalizes, migrates, and persists Tasker state from localStorage with defaults and legacy key support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePomodoroTimer.ts: Manages Pomodoro countdown timing, updates state, and logs task completions when focus sessions end.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeSettings.ts: Applies theme settings to the document including dark mode, accent color, and background images.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklyAnalytics.ts: Computes weekly task analytics including totals, completion rates, daily stats, and subject breakdowns.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and background utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/state/storageKeys.ts: Defines legacy and current localStorage keys for tasker state.
frontend/src/state/TaskerProvider.tsx: Provides the global tasker context with state persistence and actions for managing days, tasks, themes, pomodoro updates, and engagement streaks.
frontend/src/state/taskerTypes.ts: Declares TypeScript types for tasks, days, pomodoro settings, themes, and static chapter lists.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates unique task IDs using crypto.randomUUID with a timestamp fallback.
frontend/src/utils/storageKeys.ts: Exports the same storage key definitions as state/storageKeys for localStorage usage.
frontend/src/utils/taskerLogic.ts: Contains logic for sorting tasks, calculating progress, date handling, and updating the IST-based engagement streak.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, issues, and feature requests related to IST streak logic, data persistence, and footer text updates.
